[[Property:link_title|EiffelStudio: All shortcuts]]
[[Property:title|EiffelStudio: All shortcuts]]

Numerous tasks in EiffelStudio can be accomplished solely using the keyboard, without relying on mouse input

This page will show you how to find all the keyboard shortcuts available  in the environment .


== Find all Shortcuts ==

From the main menu select  "Tools" -> "Preferences..."

<center> [[Image:tool-preferences]] </center>


Now in the preference windows filter by "SHORTCUT", and you will see all the keyword shortcuts available.

<center> [[Image:preference-all-shortcuts | 800px]]  </center>
